page.title: 16SMALL BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
page.content: Vale Industries,pioneers of chopping boards and co-ordinated kitchen ware. TVI was taken over by Staffordshire Potteries who closed the factory. Wiveliscombe Design manufactures similar items,aprons,oven gloves, melamine faced boards and phenolic resin board (Formica).They sell all over the world in Canada,USA,Bermuda, France,Holland,Sweden,Italy.12 people are employed in the factory and shop.A furniture manufacturer's supplies joinery,windows,doors,tables and chairs to the public and employs 4. Yaffle Engineering supplies the bakery which has since moved to Taunton.The final site is occupied by a firm constructing aluminium ladders.It set up in business in 1966 taking over Fox Brothers textile premises,and now employs 20
